entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Harrow AAFC 02:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -16.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -21.2°C
Wind: WSW 51 km/h gust 72 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then a few flurries. Blowing snow. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow early in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
